summary: bit of an odd thing to post but I’m new here and i’m looking for some Marvel/MCU accounts to follow, especially ones that share...
body: bit of an odd thing to post but I’m new here and i’m looking for some Marvel/MCU accounts to follow, especially ones that share my love for Tony Stark. Please, please, please like or reblog this if you post such content on the reg (it doesn’t have to be the only thing you post about), and I’ll follow you!! If you like mah style, maaaaybe consider giving me a follow back?

summary: Imgane peter getting injured in a battle and tony caring him to the cumpus while flying there peter would sing and tony want to...
body:
Imgane peter getting injured in a battle and tony caring him to the cumpus while flying there peter would sing and tony want to kill himself i think it will go like this…

Peter: hey hey m.stark

Tony a tired dad: yes peter…

Peter: i can show you the world!

Tony: pliz don’t

Peter: Shining, shimmering splendid

Tony: peter stop

Peter: A  WHOLE NEW WORLD

Tony: oh god pliz stop this suffer…

Peter catching tony face :No one to tell us no Or where to go Or say we’re only dreaming m.stark

Tony : i am begging you to stop…

blog.name: irondadweek
blog.title: Irondad Week
blog.description:
March 10-16 2019

A week dedicated to Irondad and Spiderson

Admin:Kaili

Banner by @phaisty on Instagram

body:
FAQ

When will this happen?
March 10-16

What can I post?
Any type of content with Irondad in it (excluding St*rker)

Why do you not accept St*rker?
Well, it is pedophilia which both admin and mods do not agree with personally as well as this blog is about Tony’s paternal relationships.

What type of content can I post?
Anything you want! Art, fics, edits, incorrect quotes, etc. Anything and everything we will accept and reblog to our account.

What do I tag my works as?
irondadweek or irondadweek2019, you can also tag them with the corresponding day

What are the prompts?
Those will be announced as soon as we figure them out; however, we may send out a google form for voting!

Can I send an ask or suggestion?
Of course! We love it when people ask us things!

blog.name: thinkgazer
blog.title: ThINKgazer's Tumblr
blog.description: Fandom flitter. Usually a bit too shy to comment. I write and draw a bit.

summary:
Right. I’m getting back in the game. 
Here’s a scene from this beautiful Post-IW fic by @groo-ock, ‘Put Out Every Star.’ There...
body:
Right. I’m getting back in the game.

Here’s a scene from this beautiful Post-IW fic by @groo-ock, ‘Put Out Every Star.’ There are many standout scenes in that story that I found understatedly sublime. But this was an image I just couldn’t get out of my head. So it turned out to be the one to stir me out of my endless creative funk.

First ever attempt on iPad, lots of experimenting. Here’s hoping this gets better…

blog.name: irondadweek
blog.title: Irondad Week
blog.description:
March 10-16 2019

A week dedicated to Irondad and Spiderson

Admin:Kaili

Banner by @phaisty on Instagram

title: Initial Announcement
body:
Hello Everyone!

This week will be taking place March 10-16 2019.

Irondad Week is originally for the Irondad and Spiderson pairing; however, other familial pairings will be allowed (e.g. Harley and/or Tony Stark’s biological children). This week is strictly NON ST*RKER.

If  St*rker is submitted as a part of this week we will ignore it to our best capabilities. We are not looking to circulate pedophilia and instead want a nice familial bond shown between Tony Stark and his children.

You can send any questions you’d like! Please be kind to the admins/mods though. We’re people too and we like it when other people are nice to us :))

All forms of contribution are appreciated and accepted! Art, Fics, Edits, etc. will all be admired and accepted!

Thank you so much for participating and we hope to have a great week celebrating the one and only Irondad!

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Lead By Example
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2S9U5fR

by armoredsoftie

Tony dropped the phone violently and left it on the coffee table. He threw himself on the chair and closed his eyes, counting to ten.
There was no turning back. Of all his stupidly impulsive decisions, this one took the jackpot. Oh no, wait until Pepper finds out. She was going to skin him alive, oh shit.

Tony accidently comes out on twitter.

tags: you can tell i was bored
summary:
Tony: Spending time with my fiancée
I tell her I want a kid
Then a wizard appears, says my worst nightmare is coming
His cloak...
body:
Tony: Spending time with my fiancée

I tell her I want a kid

Then a wizard appears, says my worst nightmare is coming

His cloak slapped my ass and I checked him out, said I’ll allow that

His name is Stephen

And I’m so good with that

He winked at me

When he used magic

But he turned to dust

That’s pretty tragic

Now I’m lost in space

Probably dying

My son mentee also died

No, I’m not crying

And for that I say:

Fuck you, Thanos

Fuck you, Thanos

Fuck you, Thanos

I will fucking kill this purple grape

summary: Peter: I’m tired of people telling me to ‘Go to the hospital!’ and that I’ve ‘Lost a lot of blood’. It’s my stab wound, not...
body:
Peter: I’m tired of people telling me to ‘Go to the hospital!’ and that I’ve ‘Lost a lot of blood’. It’s my stab wound, not yours. Stay out of it.

Tony: YOU GOT? STABBED????

reblog.comment:

Tony: YOU GOT? STABBED????

trail.content_raw:
Peter: I’m tired of people telling me to ‘Go to the hospital!’ and that I’ve ‘Lost a lot of blood’. It’s my stab wound, not yours. Stay out of it.

Tony: YOU GOT? STABBED????
trail.content:
Peter: I’m tired of people telling me to ‘Go to the hospital!’ and that I’ve ‘Lost a lot of blood’. It’s my stab wound, not yours. Stay out of it.

Tony: YOU GOT? STABBED????
